plot: A Manhattan doctor embarks on a bizarre, night-long odyssey after his wife's admission of unfulfilled longing.

title: Kult ciała
plot: A sculptor is desperately looking for a model for his latest work entitled New Venus. One day he meets girl who seems like perfect candidate. Soon, they both fall in love with each other.

title: Sabrina
plot: Pop icon Sabrina Carpenter jingles all the bells in her first ever variety music special.

title: Butterflies Are Free
plot: A blind man moves into his own apartment against the wishes of his overprotective mother and befriends the freethinking young woman next door.

title: The Sign of Four
plot: The disappearance of a young woman's father and a mysterious note years later after the strange regular annual delivery of valuable pearls to her puts Sherlock Holmes on the case.

title: The Fifth Musketeer
plot: When French King Louis XIV (Beau Bridges) learns that his twin brother, Philippe (Beau Bridges), could usurp his crown, he sets out to imprison him in the Bastille prison but four loyal musketeers are protecting Philippe.

title: Soldier in the Rain
plot: The bond of friendship between a worldly-wise Army Master Sergeant and his naive worshiper.

title: Saturday Night and Sunday Morning
plot: A rebellious, hard-living factory worker juggles relationships with two women, one of whom is married to another man but pregnant with his child.

title: Drums Along the Mohawk
plot: Newlyweds Gil and Lana Martin try to establish a farm in the Mohawk Valley but are menaced by Indians and Tories as the Revolutionary War begins.

title: Under the Volcano
plot: A day in the life of a self-destructive British consul in Mexico on the eve of World War II.

title: Seabiscuit
plot: True story of the undersized Depression-era racehorse whose victories lifted not only the spirits of the team behind it but also those of their nation.

title: Mission to Moscow
plot: The Russian government hires the veterans of the Police Academy (1984) to help deal with the Mafia.

title: Manon 70
plot: The immortal story of beautiful Manon, who - although she loves the tolerant De Grieux - takes many lovers to satisfy her thirst for luxury.

title: Jungfer, Sie gefällt mir
plot: A Saxon village in 1792: While the Prussians go against France, the haymaking takes place in the village and the resolute Marthe catches her daughter Ev with the village blacksmith Ruprecht in the hay.

title: The Agony and the Ecstasy
plot: The biographical story of Michelangelo's troubles while painting the Sistine Chapel at the urging of Pope Julius II.

title: Tom & Viv
plot: In 1915, Tom and Viv elope, but her gynecological and emotional problems disrupt their honeymoon. Her father is angry because Tom's poetry doesn't bring in enough to live, but her mother is happy Viv has found a tender and discreet husband.

title: Tuesdays with Morrie
plot: A journalist finds himself questioning his own life when his best friend, a dying man, offers him some very powerful wisdom and advice for coping in relationships, careers and society.

title: Fukkatsu no hi
plot: After a virus devastates the global human population, survivors in Antarctica desperately try to find a cure and save the human race.

title: Death in Venice
plot: While recovering in Venice, sickly composer Gustav von Aschenbach becomes dangerously fixated with teenager Tadzio.

title: Of Mice and Men
plot: A nomadic farm worker looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend during the Great Depression.

title: Peter Pan
plot: The Darling family children receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Never Land where an ongoing war with the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.

title: The Miracle Worker
plot: The story of Anne Sullivan's struggle to teach the blind, deaf and mute child Helen Keller how to understand and communicate.

title: The Sign of Four
plot: The disappearance of a young woman's father and a mysterious note years later after the strange regular annual delivery of valuable pearls to her puts Sherlock Holmes on the case.

title: Spartacus
plot: The life of Spartacus, the gladiator who led a rebellion against the Romans. From his time as an ally of the Romans, to his betrayal and becoming a gladiator, to the rebellion he leads and its ultimate outcome.

title: Tom Sawyer
plot: Tom Sawyer and Huckleberry Finn investigate a suspicious graveyard murder and more in this musical version of Mark Twain's novel.

title: Bel Ami
plot: A chronicle of a young man's rise to power in Paris via his manipulation of the city's wealthiest and most influential women.

title: Kidnapped
plot: Three hooded Eastern-European criminals burst into a home in a Madrid gated community, holding the family hostage in its own home, and forcing the father to empty his credit cards.

title: Black Hawk Down
plot: The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily armed Somalis.

title: Nana
plot: Two ostensibly opposite women, both named Nana, become roommates in Tokyo and grow inseparable. However, their relationship is jeopardized as the harsh realities of adult life take shape.

title: The Conscript
plot: In 1833, when the fledgling Belgian kingdom still fears a Dutch invasion, recruits were selected annually from an age cohort by a draw of lots in each locality. In this grim, then contemporary drama by the 'father of Flemish literature', Hendrik Conscience, Jan Braems, a poor and naive farmers-boy, accepts the not uncommon offer by a rich family to sell his lucky ticket (out) to their son for a hefty sum compared to the miserable labor wages at the time. Army life is even harsher then a farmhand's, especially for a Dutch-speaking an-alphabet who simply can't understand his francophone superiors, and Jan's nature is not complacent enough for military discipline even by todays standards, so he soon gets into all kinds of trouble, including gambling his capital away and a venereal disease. When his girlfriend back home goes looking for him, her life is doomed as well.—KGF Vissers

title: In the Heat of the Night
plot: The cases and adventures of the police forces in and around Sparta, Mississippi.

title: Hello
plot: A man named Boney falls for Stefy and wants to marry her, but her deceased mother's ghost haunts her, disliking Boney. He faces the challenge of dealing with this supernatural obstacle to their relationship.

title: Nana
plot: Two ostensibly opposite women, both named Nana, become roommates in Tokyo and grow inseparable. However, their relationship is jeopardized as the harsh realities of adult life take shape.

title: Adajya
plot: The film is set in 1940s Assam. Three widows struggle to lead dignified lives despite the extreme restrictions mandated by law and custom.

title: Of Human Bondage
plot: A medical student becomes obsessed with his faithless lover.

title: Devdas
plot: After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas Mukherjee's life spirals further and further out of control as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to numb the pain.

title: The Stork Caliph
plot: A rich caliph is leading a careless life. One day an evil wizard sells him a magic potion that can turn human into any animal he wants. The only condition: one mustn't laugh.

title: The Battle of the Villa Fiorita
plot: An English mother leaves husband and two children to follow her Italian lover to a lakeside villa. Her children follow her, intent in breaking up her affair.

title: Romeo, Juliet and Darkness
plot: All havoc breaks loose on a film set, when 'The director' demands Gestapo perfection from his actors and crew, while hallucinating on his drugged coffee.

title: Schindler's List
plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: Les Misérables
plot: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who, for decades, has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.

title: Abar Byomkesh
plot: On vacation in the foothills of Himalayas with his wife Satyabati and his best friend Ajit, private investigator Byomkesh gets embroiled in a simple photograph theft, which is quickly followed by a gruesome murder.

title: Ernest the Rebel
plot: Adventures and misadventures of Ernest, the professional accordionist on a liner.

title: Die Hard
plot: A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

title: Memories of Matsuko
plot: When Matsuko is murdered, her nephew, Sho, gets to progressively unveil the many details of her mysterious past, discovering she wasn't just a forgotten outcast and had led an intriguing yet bizarre life.

title: The Poseidon Adventure
plot: A group of passengers must embark on a harrowing struggle for survival after a rogue wave capsizes their cruise ship at sea.

title: The Age of Innocence
plot: A tale of nineteenth-century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.

title: The Mackintosh Man
plot: A member of British Intelligence assumes a fictitious criminal identity and allows himself to be caught, imprisoned, and freed in order to infiltrate a spy organization and expose a traitor.

title: Johnny Tremain
plot: Johnny Tremain is drawn into the Revolutionary War, and becomes a patriot fighting to free the colonies from England. Along the way he learns about life and about himself.

title: The Great Meadow
plot: Berk leaves Diony and their baby to hunt down his mother's murderer and is believed to be dead. Evan provides for them & marries Diony. Berk returns and challenges Evan to a fight but Diony will not be fought over "as if I'm not human".

title: The Avenging Conscience
plot: Prevented from dating his sweetheart by his uncle, a young man turns his thoughts to murder.

title: Groove Room 3D
plot: A Victorian aristocrat unknowingly acquires a former asylum with secret passages inhabited by Jack the Ripper, intending to turn it into a romantic retreat.

title: Paper Lion
plot: Sportswriter George Plimpton poses as a rookie quarterback for the Detroit Lions for a "Sports Illustrated" article.

title: Umrao Jaan
plot: In Faizabad, British India, Dilawar is sentenced to several years in prison after Amiran's Daroga dad testifies against him. After his discharge around 1840, he extracts his vengeance by abducting Amiran and selling to a brothel madam. It is here Amiran will be re-named Umrao Jaan. Years later, Umrao has grown up and is an accomplished poetess as well as dancer extraordinary. She has many patrons, chief amongst them are Nawab Sultan and his father. The young Nawab is smitten by Umrao's beauty and her poems, but is finally forced to marry a girl of his mother's choice, leaving behind a heart-broken and devastated Umrao, who seeks solace in the arms of Faiz Ali and finally elopes with him, only to find out that he is a wanted bandit, and is shot down and killed by guards. Umrao re-locates to Kanpur where she establishes herself as a Poet and dancer, but is hunted down by brothel-keepers, Gohar Mirza and Husseini and brought back, where she is told that she must marry Gohar. Watch what Umrao does to escape from being married against her will, and her attempts to try and find her way back to her parents.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

title: The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn
plot: To avoid his abusive father, a rambunctious boy rafts the Mississippi River with a slave, encountering many wild characters.

title: Nastasja
plot: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

title: Frankenstein: The True Story
plot: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

title: The Counterfeiters
plot: The story of the Operation Bernhard, the largest counterfeiting operation in history, carried out by Germany during World War II.

title: Uranus
plot: Love is deeper than the ocean, and bigger than the universe.

title: Maya Memsaab
plot: A beautiful, wealthy woman's insatiable appetite for romance leads to tragedy and a police investigation.

title: My Son, My Son!
plot: Edmond Murray searches for answers deep in the Highlands after receiving a frantic call from his ex-wife that their seven-year-old son went missing from a campsite.

title: The Lost Honour of Katharina Blum
Tante Pose
plot: Under julefeiringen hos sorenskriver Bals blir det hemmelig forlovelse mellom to av hans vakre døtre og to studenter på julebesøk. Husdragen, tante Pose, spionerer på de unge. Tante Pose vil også gjerne bli gift, og kaster seg over den blyge sakfører Plum. Han redder seg i siste liten, og så blir det rett fra for de unge.—Ørnås

title: Sonny Boy
plot: A group of students on summer vacation find themselves transported to another dimension and granted superpowers to survive there.

title: The Bat
plot: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, the Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

title: The Reluctant Dragon
plot: Humorist Robert Benchley learns about the animation process at Walt Disney Studios while trying to find the great man himself to pitch him the idea of making a cartoon about a shy dragon.

title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
plot: Detective Sherlock Holmes is on the trail of criminal mastermind Professor Moriarty, who is carrying out a string of random crimes across Europe.

title: The Raven
plot: When a madman begins committing horrific murders inspired by Edgar Allan Poe's works, a young Baltimore detective joins forces with Poe to stop him from making his stories a reality.

title: My Name is Julia Ross
plot: Julia Ross secures employment through a rather nosy employment agency with a wealthy widow, Mrs. Hughes, and goes to live at her house. 2 days later, she awakens - in a different house, in different clothes and with a new identity. She's told she is the daughter-in-law of Mrs. Hughes and has suffered a nervous breakdown. Is Julia really 'Julia', or is it true that she's lost all memory of who she is?—Les Adams <longhorn1939@suddenlink.net>

title: Tarzan and the Lost City
plot: Tarzan returns to his homeland of Africa to save his home from destruction.

title: Tennessee's Partner
plot: In a California mining town, a gold miner, a saloon gambler and a cat-house madam strike an odd alliance revolving around a gold mine claim.

title: Jane Eyre
plot: A mousy governess who softens the heart of her employer soon discovers that he's hiding a terrible secret.

title: The Inspector General
plot: A town's corrupt officials think a fool is actually an investigator in disguise.

title: Get Carter
plot: When his brother dies under mysterious circumstances in a car accident, London gangster Jack Carter travels to Newcastle to investigate.

title: Waterloo Bridge
plot: Myra and Roy meet and fall in love on Waterloo Bridge during an air raid. Their love will be one of the war's unspoken casualties.

title: Casino
plot: In Las Vegas, two best friends--a casino executive and a Mafia enforcer--compete for a gambling empire and a fast-living, fast-loving socialite.

title: Hana Yori Dango
plot: Makino Tsukushi is an ordinary student at Eitoku Gakuen, a school for the ridiculously rich and privileged which is ruled by the Flower 4, or otherwise known as the F4, a group of four boys who come from extremely powerful families.

title: The Ninth Gate
plot: A dealer of rare books finds himself at the heart of a string of paranormal events when he is hired to find the last two copies of a text capable of summoning the devil.

title: 2010: The Year We Make Contact
plot: A team of golden age Hollywood screenwriters pitch a series of ideas to a studio head.

title: Miss Julie
plot: Over the course of a midsummer night in Fermanagh in 1890, an unsettled daughter of the Anglo-Irish aristocracy encourages her father's valet to seduce her.

title: The Time Machine
plot: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

title: Fail-Safe
plot: A technical malfunction sends American planes to Moscow to deliver a nuclear attack. Can all-out war be averted?

title: End of the Game
plot: Robin Lehman presents an intimate view of the panorama of African wildlife, giving a sense of what it is really like to be there, and in a dramatic climax makes a poignant plea for conservation. Filmed in Zaire, Kenya and Tanzania, the film takes the viewer from deep inside an anthill, to the majestic giraffes suckling their young, african storms, dung beetle ritual dances, duels for supremacy, feeding time and playtime all end, as the animals disappear one by one while the sound of a rifle shatters the existing magic of life.—Phoenix Learning Group

title: Sayonara
plot: Saeko falls into deep despair after her boyfriend Yusuke dies in a car accident. A few months later, she meets Naruse who received heart transplant from Yusuke and now he feels something for Saeko in his heart.

title: Scaramouche
plot: In France during the late 18th Century, a man sets out to avenge the death of his friend at the hands of a master swordsman.

title: Floods of Fear
plot: Two inmates working to shore up a dike during a severe flood are swept away in the current along with their guard. The three of them wind up in an isolated house whose flooded interior contains a frightened woman.

title: The Honorary Consul
plot: During the Dirty War, a half-English doctor in Argentina befriends the police, the rebels and the alcoholic Honorary British Consul, whose Latino wife he seduces. When the consul is mistakenly kidnapped by the rebels, he must pick a side.

title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
plot: A young man learns about the secrets hidden in the Heavenly Sword and the Dragon Sabre to become the head of the Kung-Fu world, while unifying the Chinese Zoroastrianism Cult, and eventually overthrows the Mongolian Dynasty.

title: And the Band Played On
plot: The story of the discovery of the AIDS epidemic, and the political infighting of the scientific community hampering the early fight with it.

title: Whale Rider
plot: A contemporary story of love, rejection and triumph as a young Maori girl fights to fulfill a destiny her grandfather refuses to recognize.

title: The Danish Girl
plot: A fictitious love story loosely inspired by the lives of Danish artists Lili Elbe and Gerda Wegener. Lili and Gerda's marriage and work evolve as they navigate Lili's groundbreaking journey as a transgender pioneer.

title: Stuart Little
plot: When the Littles adopt Stuart, the mouse, George is initially unwelcoming to his new brother, the family cat, Snowbell, is even less enthusiastic. Stuart resolves to face these difficulties with as much pluck and courage as he can muster.

title: Mutiny on the Bounty
plot: In 1787, British ship Bounty leaves Portsmouth to bring a cargo of bread-fruit from Tahiti, but the savage on-board conditions imposed by Captain Bligh trigger a mutiny led by first officer Fletcher Christian.

title: The Thirty-Nine Steps
plot: In March 1914, a mining engineer named Richard Hannay tries to prevent Prussian Agents from executing a political assassination designed to trigger World War I.

title: Dark Passage
plot: A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a woman to try to prove his innocence.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and trying to remain hopeful through simple compassion.

title: A Mighty Heart
plot: Mariane Pearl embarks on a frantic search to locate her journalist husband Daniel when he goes missing in Pakistan.

title: The Wind in the Willows
plot: Mole's underground home is bought by the Weasels from wealthy landowner Mr. Toad and Mole is thrown out. He and Rat start to fight to get his home back from evil Weasels.

title: Tom Brown's School Days
plot: A young boy starts at Rugby boarding school. He is tormented by Flashman, the school bully.

title: Neighbors
plot: After they are forced to live next to a fraternity house, a couple with a newborn baby do whatever they can to take them down.

title: Kitchen
plot: World renowned chef Gordon Ramsay puts aspiring young chefs through rigorous cooking challenges and dinner services at his restaurant in Hollywood, "Hell's Kitchen".

title: The Odyssey
plot: Follows Odysseus on his wanderings back to Ithaca following the Trojan War.

title: Native Son
plot: A young African-American living in Chicago enters into a seductive new world of money and power after he is hired as a chauffeur for an affluent businessman.

title: The Heart of the Bear
plot: Hoppy Quick goes viral on coping with the Covid lock down. Hoppy becomes something he never wanted to be as the accidental leader of the "Heart Tribe" group with a daily live stream during the most uncertain time of the pandemic.

title: Prince of Jutland
plot: An old Norse legend of revenge, power and human spirit, that subsequently inspired William Shakespeare on his tragedy - Hamlet.

title: Marnie
plot: Mark marries Marnie although she is a habitual thief and has serious psychological problems, and tries to help her confront and resolve them.

title: Green Light
plot: A brilliant young surgeon takes the blame for a colleague when a botched surgery causes a patient's death and buries himself at a wilderness research facility.

title: Runaway Jury
plot: A juror on the inside and a woman on the outside manipulate a court trial involving a major gun manufacturer.

title: Hard, Fast and Beautiful
plot: Tennis prodigy Florence Farley is torn between romance and her mother's ambitions.

title: Helpless
plot: A man searches for his fiancée who vanished without a trace just before their wedding ceremony, only to discover the shocking identity of her.

title: Phantom of the Rue Morgue
plot: When several women are found mutilated and murdered, the Paris police are baffled as to who the killer may be. All evidence points to Dupin, but soon it becomes apparent that it is someone (or something) stronger and deadlier than a human.

title: Homecoming
plot: At the end of WW2, aboard a repatriation ship, an Army doctor reminisces about his war years while being interviewed by a reporter.

title: Dagon
plot: A boating accident runs a young man and woman ashore in a decrepit Spanish fishing town which they discover is in the grips of an ancient sea god and its monstrous half human offspring.

title: Pokrajina St.2
plot: The burglars Sergej and Polde steal the valuable painting "Landscape No.2". By coincidence Sergej also takes a mysterious document dating back to the end of the World War II. Instructor is ordered to recover the stolen painting and the document, which triggers a diabolic mechanism of the past.—Anonymous

title: Mother Night
plot: An American spy behind the lines during WWII serves as a Nazi propagandist, a role he cannot escape in his future life as he can never reveal his real role in the war.

title: Le Corsaire noir
plot: Emilio Roccanera, Lord of Ventimiglia, becomes a corsair in the Spanish Main and is driven by revenge against Duke Van Guld, Governor of Maracaibo, who killed his brothers.

title: Damnation Alley
plot: In a post-apocalyptic world, a group of survivors travel and find other settlements in huge custom designed all terrain vehicles.

title: Summer Rain
plot: Seven childhood friends, in their mid twenties, honor their annual summer tradition by spending a week in a seaside town, forcing them to confront the memories of a complicated past.

title: The Curse of Frankenstein
plot: While awaiting execution for murder, Baron Victor Frankenstein tells the story of a creature he built and brought to life - only for it to behave not as he intended.

title: Whale Music
plot: Shot around the breathtaking coastline of B.C.'s Howe Sound, Whale Music is the triumphant adaptation of Paul Quarringaton's Governor General's Award-winning novel about the redemption of a faded rock star through love and music. Richard J. Lewis' exploration of the reclusive musician's efforts to create a piece of music that will summon the whales is a sensory and emotional tour de force.—Vancouver Film Festival, Handbook

title: Night at the Crossroads
plot: Maigret: Night at the Crossroads tells a complex tale of murder, deceit and greed set in an isolated country community.

title: Kurosagi
plot: Kurosaki, aka Kurosagi (Yamashita Tomohisa), is a swindler who cheats other professional con artists to help their victims and avenge the death of his own family. Kurosaki buys information about other swindlers from the man who cheated his family, Katsuragi Toshio (Yamazaki Tsutomu).—MT

title: Cinderella
plot: When her father unexpectedly dies, young Ella finds herself at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and her scheming stepsisters. Never one to give up hope, Ella's fortunes begin to change after meeting a dashing stranger.

title: Goodfellas
plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

title: Rain
plot: After a selfish L.A. yuppie learns his estranged father left a fortune to an autistic-savant brother in Ohio that he didn't know existed, he absconds with his brother and sets out across the country, hoping to gain a larger inheritance.

title: Scent of a Woman
plot: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

title: Devil in the Flesh
plot: She's young, sexy and dangerous. Debbie is the new girl in class with a skill for turning heads. From the moment she arrives in town following her parents' untimely death, Debbie sets her sights on her teacher, the high school heartthrob.

title: Fire Over England
plot: During the reign of Elizabeth I, a young man's fervent devotion to the crown and to his sweetheart, a lady-in-waiting, lead him to battle for England's victory over the Spanish Armada in 1588.

title: The Bride
plot: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

title: A Taste of Honey
plot: A pregnant teenage girl must fend for herself when her mother remarries, leaving the girl with only a new male friend for support.

title: The Black Shield of Falworth
plot: Peasant Myles Falworth is trained for knighthood and is groomed by various nobles to defeat the evil Earl of Alban who's plotting to usurp King Henry IV's throne.

title: Mandingo
plot: An 1840s slaveowner trains one of his slaves to be a bare-knuckle fighter.

title: My Cousin Rachel
plot: A young Englishman plots revenge against his late cousin's mysterious, beautiful wife, believing her responsible for his death. But his feelings become complicated as he finds himself falling under the beguiling spell of her charms.

title: Eli Sjursdotter
plot: During the great Nordic war in 1719, the Swedes occupied Trøndelag. During the retreat most freeze to death. But some seek refuge, even if the farmers are chasing them. Sjur comes on the trail of Per who is in love with Eli.

title: Friedemann Bach
plot: During a house concert, the Bach family gets a visit by their son Wilhelm Friedemann, who has just given up his position in Dresden because he no longer could endure the reprisals of his superiors.

title: Yojimbo
plot: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

title: The Last Remake of Beau Geste
plot: An aging Sir Hector Geste (Trevor Howard) takes a young greedy wife who's after his famed Blue Water sapphire, but his sons hide the gem and join the French Foreign Legion in North Africa.

title: Lilies of the Field
plot: A travelling handyman becomes the answer to the prayers of nuns who wish to build a chapel in the desert.

title: Ivan Vasilievich: Back to the Future
plot: An ordinary Soviet building manager, living in the 20th century, looks like Tsar of All Rus' - Ivan IV the Terrible (1530 - 1584). He'd never known this, until his neighbor created a time machine.

title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
plot: British retirees travel to India to take up residence in what they believe is a newly restored hotel. Less luxurious than advertised, the Marigold Hotel nevertheless slowly begins to charm in unexpected ways.

title: Terje Vigen
plot: Terje Vigen, a sailor, suffers the loss of his family through the cruelty of another man. Years later, when his enemy's family finds itself dependent on Terje's beneficence, Terje must decide whether to avenge himself.

title: A Little Princess
plot: Sara is sent to a strict boarding school after her father enlists in WWI. When he is presumed dead, the headmistress, knowing she will not receive any more money, forces the girl to become a servant.

title: Intersection
plot: While driving on a remote highway, indecisive architect Vincent Eastman is torn between reuniting with his estranged frigid calculating wife Sally or taking up with his lover Olivia Marshak, a magazine writer.

title: Madamigella di Maupin
plot: Mlle de Maupin escapes from her uncle's castle, invaded by Hungarian troops, under the guise of a clergyman named Theodore. An army recruiter forces Theodore to enlist in the King's army, and not even the religious robe is an insurance against it. Theodore is assigned to be aide-de-camp to Alcibiade, a man as virile in combat, as he seems troubled for the figure of his aid... D'Albert, an aristocrat, will expose Theodore's true sex, and after a number of confusing, comedy situations, Alcibiade will appease his troubled feelings.—Artemis-9

title: Snow White
plot: Live-action adaptation of the 1937 Disney animated film 'Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs'.

title: Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy
plot: In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced from semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet Agent within MI6.

title: The Green Archer
plot: The struggle over the Bellamy estate ends with Michael Bellamy accused of murder and killed on the way to prison, while his brother Abel Bellamy takes control of the estate for his own nefarious plans.

title: The Innocent
plot: An accidental killing leads a man down a dark hole of intrigue and murder. Just as he finds love and freedom, one phone call brings back the nightmare.

title: Circle of Friends
plot: Three women, who've been friends since childhood, meet at university in Dublin in 1957. Student and boyfriend life begins.

title: The Light in the Forest
plot: A young white man who spent his whole life raised by Native Americans is sent to live with his birth family and must learn to fit in with people he was taught to hate.

title: The Ring Two
plot: 6 months after the incidents involving the lethal videotape, new clues prove that there is a new evil lurking in the darkness.

title: Beyond Witch Mountain
plot: Based on the film, Escape to Witch Mountain. Tony and Tia leave Witch Mountain to look for their Uncle Bene, and they all fall into the clutches of the evil Deranian. They have to use their special powers to outwit him.

title: La montagna di luce
plot: The Rajah of Punjab wants to come into possession of a famous gem known as "Mountain of Light". He asks adventurer Allan Foster to steal it for him, but Foster has other plans.

title: The Return of the Soldier
plot: Chris returns from WWI unable to recognize his wife Kitty. He wants to reunite with Margaret, his former lover. Kitty hires a psychiatrist to address Chris's feelings for Margaret and cousin Jenny, but sees the man she knew is gone.

title: The Assassination Bureau
plot: A woman causes a group of assassins to face their greatest challenge.

title: The Unfaithful
plot: A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.

title: A Season on the Brink
plot: The story of 1985-86 season of Indiana University's men's basketball team, led by the controversial coach Bob Knight, who would later be banned for his abusive behavior.

title: Helter Skelter
plot: Top star Lilico undergoes multiple cosmetic surgeries to her entire body. As her surgeries show side effect.

title: My Summer of Love
plot: In the Yorkshire countryside, working-class tomboy Mona meets the exotic, pampered Tamsin. Over the summer season, the two young women discover they have much to teach one another, and much to explore together.

title: Back Street
plot: A magical, giant city that challenges centuries; Istanbul. And our brave police who challenges all kinds of bad and trouble to make every street of this city better, "livable" for everybody.

title: Baise Moi
plot: Two young women, marginalized by society, go on a destructive tour of sex and violence.

title: Cop Hater
plot: The hardworking detectives of the 87th Precinct in an unnamed city during a massive heat wave investigate the seemingly random murders of policemen.

title: Eva
plot: When Eva, a young housemaid, gets involved in a steamy threesome with a houseboy and her lady boss, she realizes she has to choose only one of them.
The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

title: Lost Command
plot: French Army colonel Raspeguy leads his paratroopers in battle against the Communist Viet Minh in Indochina and against Algerian guerrillas during the Algerian War.

title: Yentl
plot: A Jewish girl disguises herself as a boy to enter religious training.

title: Samson and Delilah
plot: When strongman Samson rejects the love of the beautiful Philistine woman Delilah, she seeks vengeance that brings horrible consequences they both regret.

title: Under the Greenwood Tree
plot: In this lighthearted romance from Victorian novelist Thomas Hardy, the beautiful new village school teacher is pursued by three suitors: a working-class man, a landowner, and the vicar.

title: One Day in the Life of Ivan Denisovich
plot: Ivan Denisovich Shukhov has been sentenced to a camp in the Soviet gulag system. He was accused of becoming a spy after being captured briefly by the Germans as a prisoner of war during World War II. He is innocent, but is sentenced to ten years in a forced labor camp. The day begins with Shukhov waking up sick. For waking late, he is forced to clean the guardhouse, but this is a comparatively minor punishment. When Shukhov is finally able to leave the guardhouse, he goes to the dispensary to report his illness. It is relatively late in the morning by this time, however, so the orderly is unable to exempt any more workers and Shukhov must work. Based on the life of Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn.

title: Bicentennial Man
plot: The life and times of Andrew, a robot purchased as a household appliance programmed to perform menial tasks. As Andrew begins to experience emotions and creative thought, the Martin family soon discovers they don't have an ordinary robot.

title: The Wave
plot: A high school teacher's experiment to demonstrate to his students what life is like under a dictatorship spins horribly out of control when he forms a social unit with a life of its own.

title: Jules Verne's Rocket to the Moon
plot: In Victorian England, an American showman uses a wealthy Frenchman's finances to build a German explosives expert's giant cannon designed to fire a people-filled projectile to the Moon, but spies and saboteurs endanger the project.

title: The Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
plot: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

title: Inspector Maigret
plot: In the Marais district in central Paris, somebody is going round murdering young women. Maigret is called to investigate.

title: Simpatico
plot: After scams at horse races and making lots of money, 3 young people split. 20 years later, one of them, a drunk, creates chaos with photos from back then.

title: The Bostonians
plot: A Boston feminist and a conservative Southern lawyer contend for the heart and mind of a beautiful and bright girl unsure of her future.

title: Kristin Lavransdatter
plot: Kristin is the daughter of a prominent landowner in medieval Norway. She grows up in total harmony with the ideals of the time: strong family ties, social pride and devout Christianity. She accepts the fact that her father has arranged for her to marry the son of another landowner. Kristin's beauty and purity create violent emotions around her. There are envy and attempted rape, murder and revenge. She seeks refuge from the world in a convent, awaiting the time for her marriage. Here the passion of her life strikes, the knight Erlend Nikulaussonn. He, an accomplished seducer, also falls hopelessly in love. They have to cross not only convent walls to meet, but social boundaries as well. Their love cannot be kept secret, and suddenly the innocent Kristin is the centre of a scandal. Her fiance withdraws from their engagement, her father rages, and Erlend's former mistress tries to poison her. The affair grows into a political issue, and finally some of the country's most dignified leaders persuade Lavrans to give in. The lovers win each other, but it is in front of a charred altar in a burnt down church, and their happiness has a double edge.—The Norwegian Film Institute

title: Lorelei: The Witch of the Pacific Ocean
Edge of Madness
plot: 1851, Manitoba's Red River Valley. As winter sets in, a young woman on the edge of madness arrives exhausted at the fort, a wilderness station, claiming she murdered her husband. She's placed in a cell; for the next several months, she sews while the local prefect, Henry Mullen, investigates. In flashbacks we see her arranged marriage to the hard-working but angry Simon, who takes her to his half-built homestead and abuses her. She's treated well by his younger brother George, with whom she laughs, but he's too weak to protect her. Is she guilty? At the homestead, Mullen hears a different story, one that exonerates Annie. Can he unearth the truth? Then what?—<jhailey@hotmail.com>

title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
plot: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

title: C'est pas moi, je le jure!
plot: During the summer of 1968, Leon, a 10-year-old boy, navigates the hardships of young love, his lunatic mother's whims, and his urges to vandalize the house of his neighbors.

title: Sorekara
plot: Daisuke (Yusaku Matsuda) is supposed to be out looking for a respectable job and equally respectable wife. He is 30 years old and devotes his attention to music and literature; his family is wealthy and can support his interests. When his friend Hiraoka (Kaoru Kobayashi) returns with his wife Michiyo (Miwako Fujitani), problems arise.

title: Scrooge
plot: Ebenezer Scrooge, a curmudgeonly, miserly businessman, has no time for sentimentality and largely views Christmas as a waste of time. However, this Christmas Eve, he will be visited by three spirits who will show him the error of his ways.

title: The Gruffalo
plot: A cunning mouse goes for a walk in the forest, and outwits a succession of predators.

title: Mysterious Island
plot: Sean Anderson partners with his mom's husband on a mission to find his grandfather, who is thought to be missing on a mythical island.

title: Witchblade
plot: NYPD Det. Sara Pezzini has a supernatural weapon and abilities to help her fight evil.

title: Rough Cut
plot: Two sophisticated jewel thieves join forces to steal $30 million in uncut jewels. Despite a continuous exchange of quips they eventually become romantically involved.

title: The Constant Gardener
plot: A widower's transcontinental quest to find answers about his wife's death leads him to explosive secrets.

title: Rasen
plot: A young pathologist seeks answers to the mysterious death of a friend and soon comes into contact with the same cursed videotape that caused the death of the friend's wife and son, which is haunted by the curse of Sadako, a relentless spirit.

title: Ma and Pa Kettle
plot: On the verge of being evicted from their run-down farmhouse, the large Kettle family is given a new, modern home after Pa wins a contest, but a jealous local woman accuses him of having plagiarized his winning slogan.

title: Zaza
plot: Zaza is the favorite actress at an open-air theater in a small French town. When diplomat Bernard Dufresne comes to the village, he stays away for fear he will fall for her. But when Zaza is badly injured, he has no choice.

title: Barabbas
plot: Governor Pontius Pilate gave the populace a choice to spare either Barabbas, a criminal, or Jesus, condemned as a heretic, from crucifixion. The masses chose Barrabas, and he is haunted by the image of Jesus for the rest of his life.

title: Flatland
plot: This Sci-Fi adventure follows the struggle between good and evil forces in an alternate universe, and what happens when their 4,000-year-long conflict crosses over into modern-day Shanghai to endanger both worlds.

title: The Handmaid's Tale
plot: Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.

title: Jamaica Inn
plot: In Cornwall, 1819, a young woman discovers she's living near a gang of criminals who arrange shipwrecks for profit.

title: Mathilukal
plot: Its a story of Basheer, an author who experiences his prison life. In it he finds friendship, loneliness, fear and finally love, but that remains questionable.

title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
plot: In a magically realistic version of Toronto, a young man must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes one by one in order to win her heart.

title: The Method
plot: An aging actor, who long ago enjoyed a brush with fame, makes his living as an acting coach.

title: Soft Hands
plot: A rich man who have two daughters one of his daughters married to poor man and he didn't approve that marriage then he broke and stay without any money so his daughter and her husband helped him through his friend when he find out he refused and decided to start working—aarmr9

title: Sherlock Holmes
plot: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

title: The Story of the Great Heroes
plot: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.

title: The Island of Dr. Moreau
plot: After being rescued and brought to an island, a man discovers that its inhabitants are experimental animals being turned into strange-looking humans, all of it the work of a visionary doctor.

title: Witness for the Prosecution
plot: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

title: Hashire Melos!
plot: A story about the friendship between two men, during the reign of Dionysius II, at Syracuse, Sicily. Selinteus firmly believes that Melos (a strange friend) will keep his promise. But many forces are at work against.

title: Timeline
plot: A group of archaeologists get embroiled in an adventure where they must travel back in time to 14th Century France, to save their professor before the French battle the English at Castlegard. If they fail, they won't be able to return.

title: The American Friend
plot: Tom Ripley, who deals in forged art, suggests a picture framer he knows would make a good hit man.

title: The Day of the Locust
plot: An art director in the 1930s falls in love and attempts to make a young woman an actress despite Hollywood who wants nothing to do with her because of her problems with an estranged man and her alcoholic father.

title: Easy Virtue
plot: A young Englishman marries a glamorous American. When he brings her home to meet the parents, she arrives like a blast from the future - blowing their entrenched British stuffiness out the window.

title: The Spy Who Loved Me
plot: James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. agent whose lover he killed.

title: Ernest Maltravers
plot: A girl saves a rich man from his murderous father and meets him again after escaping a forces marriage and having a baby.

title: Mankurt
plot: The film is about a Turkmen who defends his homeland from invasion. He is captured, tortured, and brainwashed into serving his homeland's conquerors. He is so completely turned that he kills his mother when she attempts to rescue him from captivity.—TMDB

title: Beyond the Rocks
plot: A young woman marries an older millionaire and then falls in love with a handsome nobleman on her honeymoon.

title: Hansel and Gretel
plot: Brother/sister duo Hansel and Gretel are professional witch-hunters who help innocent villagers. One day they stumble upon a case that could hold the key to their past.

title: Band of Angels
plot: Amantha Starr grows up as a privileged Southern belle in the ante-bellum South, but after her father dies broke, her world is destroyed when she discovers that her mother was Black.

title: Show Boat
plot: The daughter of a riverboat captain falls in love with a charming gambler, but their fairy tale romance is threatened after his luck turns sour.

title: The Constant Nymph
plot: The daughter (Joan Fontaine) of a musical mentor (Montagu Love) is hopelessly in love with her cousin's husband (Charles Boyer), a handsome composer.

title: 24 Hours in the Life of a Woman
plot: By the Lake of Lugano, in 1917, Lady Alice Copland, the widow of an English lord, meets Thomas in a casino. The handsome young man has just gambled all his money away. Moved both by his lot and by his good looks, Alice prevents him from committing suicide; comforts him and becomes his mistress. After learning that her lover has deserted the Austrian Army, she gives him the money he needs to return to Zurich and accompanies him to the station. Shortly afterwards she surprises him at the casino, gambling the money she gave him.—Guy Bellinger

title: The Postman
plot: A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.

title: Árvácska
plot: An orphan girl suffers abuse from her adopting parents.

title: Cluny Brown
plot: A free-spirited parlor maid and a Czech refugee surprise an English village with their unconventional ways.

title: The Man on the Balcony
plot: Charles, a retired man, gets a new lease on life when he answers an ad from a private investigator and becomes a mole in a secret investigation in a nursing home.

title: The First Men in the Moon
plot: When a spaceship lands on the moon, it is hailed as a new accomplishment, before it becomes clear that a Victorian party completed the journey in 1899, leading investigators to that mission's last survivor.

title: Twenty-four Eyes
plot: Schoolteacher Hisako Oishi forms an emotional bond with her pupils and teaches them various virtues, while at the same time worrying about their future.

title: Nasty Love
plot: When an elderly woman dies--apparently happy but in curious circumstances--her daughter travels home to Naples for the funeral. Staying on, she tries to piece together her mother's recent life. In doing so she starts to confront childhood memories that shaped the family history.—Jeremy Perkins {J-26}

title: Dracula
plot: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

title: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
plot: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.

title: A Tale of Two Cities
plot: A pair of lookalikes, one a former French aristocrat and the other an alcoholic English lawyer, fall in love with the same woman amidst the turmoil of the French Revolution.

title: Killing Me Softly
plot: A young American woman living in London begins a passionate and kinky affair with a handsome stranger who may have a dark and dangerous past.

title: Midnight Cowboy
plot: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.

title: A Litre of Tears
plot: The story of a 15-year-old high school student, Ikeuchi Aya, who soon discovers she has an incurable disease that affects the cerebellum of the brain. Aya lived her life to the fullest until her death at 25.

title: The Satan Bug
plot: A germ that could destroy life on Earth is stolen from a biological warfare lab and the thief threatens to release it into the open, prompting a security officer to act.

title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
plot: A former vaudeville child star torments her paraplegic sister, who eclipsed her as a movie star, in their decaying Hollywood mansion while desperately clinging to hopes of a comeback.

title: The Borrowers
plot: A secret family of four-inch people living inside the walls of a house must save their home from an evil real estate developer.

title: The Drowning Pool
plot: Harper's a big-city PI, who travels to Louisiana to help an old girlfriend who's worried her husband will find out she's been cheating on him.

title: Thank You for Smoking
plot: Satirical comedy follows the machinations of Big Tobacco's chief spokesman, Nick Naylor, who spins on behalf of cigarettes while trying to remain a role model for his 12-year-old son.

title: Les amitiés particulières
plot: A tale of the tender relationship between a twelve-year-old boy and the upperclassman who is the object of his desire. All set in the rigid atmosphere of a Jesuit-run school.

title: Red Cliff
plot: The first chapter of a two-part story centered on a battle fought in China's Three Kingdoms period (220-280 A.D.).

title: Untold Scandal
plot: In late 1700s Korea, Lady Cho challenges the playboy Lord Jo-won into seducing and sleeping with her husband's coming young, virgin concubine. Lady Cho agrees to sleep with him if he succeeds.

title: Beyond
plot: Having left Saint Marie to be with Martha, DI Humphrey Goodman starts a new life with her in Devon, bringing his unique brand of chaotic genius to the small, close-knit community.

title: Pippi Goes on Board
plot: The further adventures of super-strong girl Pippi Longstocking and her friends Tommy and Annika in this sequel compilation film of the classic Swedish TV series.

title: The Wizard of Loneliness
plot: After his mother dies and father goes to fight in World War II, a young boy moves in with his aunt and uncle who live in the countryside. Lonely and unhappy, he starts believing he has super powers. Then a "dead" man shows up.

title: One for the Money
plot: Unemployed and newly-divorced Stephanie Plum lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

title: A Hunting Accident
plot: A romantic drama in which a beautiful but poor young woman has to choose between three suitors: an old widower, a decadent nobleman and a handsome but poor young man.

title: Aces High
plot: In World War I, the high casualty rate amongst the rookie pilots of the Royal Flying Corps puts an enormous strain on the survivors.

title: The Murder of Princess Diana
plot: A fictionalized account of the events leading up to the tragic car accident that claimed the lives of Princess Diana, her companion Dodi Fayed and their chauffeur in a Paris tunnel.

title: The Sea Hawk
plot: Geoffrey Thorpe, a buccaneer, is hired by Queen Elizabeth I to nag the Spanish Armada. The Armada is waiting for an attack on England and Thorpe surprises them with attacks on their galleons where he shows his skills with the sword.

title: Knights of the Teutonic Order
plot: In the 15th century the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth is facing a hard struggle against the neighboring Teutonic Order.Frequent clashes between the two powers finally culminate in 1410 with the Battle of Grunwald.

title: The Cat in the Hat
plot: Two bored children have their lives turned upside down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

title: Flowers in the Attic
plot: This limited series tells the origin story of Olivia and Malcolm Foxworth and how dark family secrets shaped the Foxworth family from the very beginning.

title: Desyat Negrityat
plot: A psychological thriller based on the novel by Agatha Christie. Ten strangers are forced to come face to face with their dark pasts after receiving invitation to an isolated island off the coast of England.

title: Desperation
plot: A Southern Noir thriller, set in a tough-and-tumble Mississippi town where a woman and her young daughter are caught in the crossfire when whiskey, guns, and the desire for revenge violently intersect.

title: Anthony Adverse
plot: In 18th-century Italy, an orphan's debt to the man who raised him threatens to separate him forever from the woman he loves.

title: La Pasión Turca
plot: Follows a Spanish professor of Fine Arts and her Turkish lover in their romantic and passionate relationship.

title: Ben X
plot: As an alternative to getting bullied at school, an autistic teenager retreats into the world of online role-playing games.

title: Island of Lost Souls
plot: A mad doctor conducts ghastly genetic experiments on a remote island in the South Seas, much to the fear and disgust of the shipwrecked sailor who finds himself trapped there.

title: Poor Cow
plot: A young woman lives a life full of bad choices. At a young age she has a baby by an abusive thief who quickly lands in prison. When her son goes missing, she gets to grips with what is most important to her.

title: Maximum Overdrive
plot: A group of people try to survive when machines start to come alive and become homicidal.

title: A Night to Remember
plot: On her maiden voyage in April 1912, the supposedly unsinkable RMS Titanic strikes an iceberg in the Atlantic Ocean.

title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives advanced intelligence to a chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

title: The Mysteries of Pittsburgh
plot: A college graduate's defining summer crossing his gangster dad and exploring love, sexuality, and the enigmas surrounding his life and his city.

title: Bridge to Terabithia
plot: Leslie and Jess create the secret kingdom of Terabithia, a land of monsters, trolls, ogres and giants where they spend their free time ruling as king and queen and fighting evil creatures.

title: Raj Tilak
plot: A young man goes on a quest to find his mother and to restore justice in a kingdom that has fallen into the hands of traitors.

title: On the Black Hill
plot: The story covers eighty years in the lives of a pair of Welsh identical twins with an unusual bond, as they go through war, love affairs and land disputes.

title: An Inspector Calls
plot: A mysterious inspector investigates the wealthy Birling family and their dinner guest following the suicide of a young woman.

title: It's Kind of a Funny Story
plot: A clinically-depressed teenager gets a new start after he checks himself into an adult psychiatric ward.

title: Dr. Dolittle
plot: A doctor discovers that he can communicate with animals.

title: Howling V: The Rebirth
plot: A group of strangers visit an ancient Hungarian castle and bring along a werewolf.

title: Son of Frankenstein
plot: Returning to the ancestral castle long after the death of the monster, the son of Dr. Frankenstein meets a mad shepherd who is hiding the comatose creature. To clear the family name, he revives the creature and tries to rehabilitate him.

title: Devdas
plot: After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas Mukherjee's life spirals further and further out of control as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to numb the pain.

title: Tarzan the Tiger
plot: After Tarzan's estate is destroyed by Arabs Jane is sold into slavery by a man posing as a friendly scientist.

title: The Admirable Crichton
plot: In 1905, Lord Henry Loam and his family and servants are shipwrecked on a deserted island where the survival of the fittest renders the rigid class system irrelevant.

title: The Four Feathers
plot: A young British officer resigns his commission just before his regiment is sent to battle and soon receives four white feathers from his friends and fiancee as symbols of what they view as his cowardice.

title: Lassie Come Home
plot: Shawn and Gus return to Santa Barbara, California to help their old police chief, but find themselves unwelcome in their old stomping ground as they secretly untangle a case that involves the supernatural.

title: For the Term of his Natural Life
plot: England 1834. The young Rufus is sentenced after an intrigue and banished to Australia for life.

title: Radio Free Albemuth
plot: Sci-fi thriller from Philip K. Dick (Blade Runner, Minority Report, A Scanner Darkly); Nick Brady receives messages from space and joins conspiracy to overthrow authoritarian U. S. regime.

title: Benito Cereno
plot: When Captain Amaso Delano approaches a three-masted ship in distress to offer his assistance.

title: Doctor in the House
plot: Medical students' antics and flirtations with nurses exasperate their professor, despite their good intentions

title: Hostage
plot: When a family is held hostage, former hostage negotiator Jeff Talley arrives at the scene. Talley's own family is kidnapped and Talley must decide which is more important: saving a family he doesn't even know or saving his own family.

title: Audition
plot: A widower takes an offer to screen girls at a special audition, arranged for him by a friend to find him a new wife. The one he fancies is not who she appears to be after all.

title: The Boy on the Galloping Horse
plot: Follows a boy, a mole, a fox and a horse, as they create an unexpected friendship and travel together in the boy's search for home.

title: You Are the Apple of My Eye
plot: A group of close friends who attend a private school all have a debilitating crush on the sunny star pupil, Sun-ah. The only member of the group who claims not to is Jin-woo, but he ends up loving her as well.

title: Thirteen at Dinner
plot: An American movie actress, best known for playing dumb blondes, is Scotland Yard's prime suspect when her husband, Lord Edgware, is murdered. The great detective, Hercule Poirot, digs deeper into the case.

title: Failan
plot: A marriage of convenience between a petty gangster and an illegal immigrant he has never met has unforeseen consequences for them both.

title: Marius
plot: Marius is faced with a choice whether to fulfill his passion by sailing the seas or stay and marry the woman he loves.

title: The Silence of the Sea
plot: The story of girl and dreams in the river ocean.

title: Siberian Lady Macbeth
plot: In what might be termed Russo-Shakespearean noir, a ruthless woman's adulterous affair with a drifter sets in motion a chain-reaction of murder and deception in a remote village in 19th Century Mtsensk.

title: Stalag 17
plot: After two Americans are killed while escaping from a German P.O.W. camp in World War II, the barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

title: Only Two Can Play
plot: A frustrated librarian (Sellers) in Swansea, Wales is torn between his wife Jean (Maskell) and a glamorous married woman, Liz (Zetterling), who wants to have an affair.

title: The Cement Garden
plot: Four children live with their terminally ill mother. After she dies, they try to hold things together. In their isolated house, they begin to deteriorate mentally, whilst they hide their mom's decomposing corpse in a makeshift concrete sarcophagus.

title: Madame Sousatzka
plot: Renowned Russian piano teacher Irina Sousatzka gets a new student - Bengali piano prodigy Manek Sen. They are both immigrants in the UK and bond quickly. When his single mother Sushila's business fails, he must make a career decision.

title: The Secret of the Iron Door
Return to the Blue Lagoon
plot: In this sequel to The Blue Lagoon (1980), two children are stranded on a beautiful island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together and eventually become suntanned teenagers in love.

title: Limitless
plot: A mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100% of his brain's abilities transforms a struggling writer into a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with many dangers.

title: Dust
plot: An eight-year-old girl asks her scheming neighbor for help in killing the monster under her bed that she thinks ate her family.

title: Metropolis
plot: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

title: 24 Hours
plot: Cameras follow Bedfordshire Police over a 24 hour period as they respond to emergencies, investigate crimes, arrest suspects and battle against the clock.

title: Breakfast on Pluto
plot: In the 1970s, a young trans woman, Patrick "Kitten" Braden, comes of age by leaving her Irish town for London, in part to look for her mother and in part because her gender identity is beyond the town's understanding.

title: She
plot: Professional writer and amateur sleuth Jessica Fletcher uses her intellect, charm, and persistence to get to the bottom of every crime she encounters.

title: Brewster's Millions
plot: Follows Morgan Brewster's quest to inherit her uncle's fortune before Christmas. Amid holiday chaos, she discovers love, faith, and family's importance through giving.

title: Dersu Uzala
plot: The Russian army sends an explorer on an expedition to the snowy Siberian wilderness where he makes friends with a seasoned local hunter.

title: Nosferatu: The First Vampire
plot: "Nosferatu: The First Vampire" is a 1998 direct-to-video movie with the horror classic, "Nosferatu", remastered with a soundtrack by Type-O Negative and hosted by David Carradine.

title: Alkitrang dugo
plot: A group of Filipino teenaged boys and girls survives a plane crash and copes to live in an island amid politics, social class, sanity and death.

title: Howling: New Moon Rising
plot: A small town desert community in southern California begins experiencing a number of brutal, werewolf-like slayings, following the arrival of a strange motorcyclist.

title: Stella
plot: A series set in the fictional village of Pontyberry in the South Wales Valleys centered on the lives of a single mother in her forties, who earns a living doing the locals' ironing, and her family and friends.

title: PS, I Love You
plot: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.

title: Forbidden
plot: A starship crew in the 23rd century goes to investigate the silence of a distant planet's colony, only to find just two survivors, a powerful robot, and the deadly secret of a lost civilization.

title: Cyrano de Bergerac
plot: Famed swordsman and poet Cyrano de Bergerac is in love with his cousin Roxane. He has never expressed his love for her as he his large nose undermines his self-confidence. Then he finds a way to express his love to her, indirectly.

title: Red Shadow
plot: A love triangle blooms between a team of three ninjas before tragedy strikes and forces them to reassess their clan's principles.

title: Witness for the Prosecution
plot: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

title: Sang Penari
plot: Young teenagers who fall in love live in poverty in their small village in the 1960s. The girl, Srintil, is a dancer blessed with dancing moves that said have a certain magic. The boy, Rasus, leaves the village to join the army force.

title: The Case of the Velvet Claws
plot: Perry marries Della but a beautiful woman interrupts their honeymoon night and demands Perry take her case at gunpoint.

title: Papillon
plot: Wrongfully convicted for murder, Henri Charriere forms an unlikely relationship with fellow inmate and quirky convicted counterfeiter, Louis Dega, in an attempt to escape from the notorious penal colony on Devil's Island.

title: The Exorcist III
plot: A police lieutenant uncovers more than he bargained for as his investigation of a series of murders, which have all the hallmarks of the deceased Gemini serial killer, leads him to question the patients of a psychiatric ward.

title: A Civil Action
plot: At the risk of bankrupting his firm and career, lawyer Jan Schlichtman takes on a case involving two companies responsible for causing children to be diagnosed with leukemia due to the town's contaminated water supply.

title: The Incredible Shrinking Man
plot: After Scott Carey begins to shrink because of exposure to a combination of radiation and insecticide, medical science is powerless to help him.

title: Counsellor at Law
plot: A successful attorney has his Jewish heritage and poverty-stricken background brought home to him when he learns that his wife has been unfaithful.

title: The Hyperboloid of Engineer Garin
plot: A talented inventor who created the machine of unprecedented destructive power is obsessed with world domination. In his manic quest he commits one crime after another, without assuming the dreadful consequences would be for him.

title: The Patriot
plot: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

title: Ronia, the Robber's Daughter
plot: Ronja, the only child of robber chief Mattis must learn to survive the dangers of her local wilderness. In secret she also befriends Birk, the son of a rivaling robber Borka.

title: Blood of the Railroad Workers
plot: In a rich town somewhere in Norway in 1910, a railroad is made with the bare hands of traveling railroad workers. With them follows noise and trouble, due to drinking and fighting. On of them, Sjugurd, sets his eye on a farmer daughter.

title: Afterwards
plot: Newly divorced lawyer Nathan Del Amico is shaken up after he meets a doctor who claims that he can sense when select people are about to die.

title: Ricky Rapper
plot: When Ricky's aunt Serena goes on a vacation with her boyfriend, her cousin Fanny returns to look after Ricky and Nelly. Ricky's new bike disappears, and they must figure out what happened to it.

title: The Seven-Per-Cent Solution
plot: To treat his friend's cocaine induced delusions, Watson lures Sherlock Holmes to Sigmund Freud.

title: The Adventures of Pinocchio
plot: One of puppet-maker Geppetto's creations comes magically to life. This puppet named Pinocchio has one major desire, to become a real boy someday, but he has to learn to act responsibly.

title: Take Her, She's Mine
plot: A father's attempts to protect his college-age daughter from trouble backfire and he finds himself in the middle of scandal after scandal.

title: The One That Got Away
plot: A woman devoid of love encounters her first love. Will she stay faithful or yield to desire?

title: Heart
plot: An intelligence operative for a shadowy global peacekeeping agency races to stop a hacker from stealing its most valuable and dangerous weapon.

title: Gone with the Woman
plot: A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

title: The Paul Street Boys
plot: In Budapest, two rival gangs of young boys lay claim to a vacant lot. The hostilities escalate yet never quite boil over into actual violence. The film poignantly portrays the struggles and resilience of youth amid the harsh realities of war.—Ed Cresdee

title: The Triumph of Sherlock Holmes
plot: Holmes, retired to Sussex, is drawn into a last case when his arch enemy Moriarty arranges with an American gang to kill one John Douglas, a country gentleman with a mysterious past.

title: Send Me No Flowers
plot: When a hypochondriac believes he is dying, he makes plans for his wife--which she discovers and misunderstands.

title: The Children's Hour
plot: A rebellious student at a girls' school accuses two teachers of lesbianism.

title: Hideous Kinky
plot: Unsatisfied with her life in England, young mother Julia relocates to Morocco with her small daughters, Lucy and Bea. Although the family enjoys various adventures, they struggle to make ends meet.

title: Mean Girls
plot: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

title: Tempo di uccidere
plot: In 1936, when Ethiopia is being invaded by the Italian army, Lieutenant Silvestri sets off for the nearest camp hospital to take care of a toothache. En route he meets a young Ethiopian girl, which leads to a tragic course of events that devastates his entire life.—1felco

title: 21 Days
plot: After Larry accidentally kills his lover Wanda's estranged blackmailing husband, someone else is arrested for the crime. Larry and Wanda nervously await the verdict: if the innocent suspect is found guilty then Larry will give himself up.

title: The Shaggy D.A.
plot: Wilby Daniels, now all grown up and running for district attorney, finds himself once again turning into a shaggy dog at inopportune moments.

title: Mommie Dearest
plot: The abusive and traumatic adoptive upbringing of Christina Crawford at the hands of her mother, screen queen Joan Crawford, is depicted.

title: Ramata
plot: Ramata is a spellbindingly beautiful woman in her fifties. She has been married for thirty years now to Matar Samb, a very rich man, a former prosecutor who is now Minister of Justice. They live in Les Almadies, an elegant neighborhood of Dakar. Ngor Ndong is twenty-five. He is young, strong, mysterious and homeless. He is an occasional petty crook, known to the police. One evening, in a taxi that Ngor Ndong just happens to be driving, Ramata, reticent at first, finally agrees to follow this young man half her age to the Copacabana, a dive in the seediest part of Dakar.—Anonymous

title: Never Love a Stranger
plot: Following the life of an orphan and the events that change his life and lead him into a life of crime.

title: Nosferatu: Phantom der Nacht
plot: Count Dracula moves from Transylvania to Wismar, spreading the Black Plague across the land. Only a woman pure of heart can bring an end to his reign of horror.

title: Alraune
plot: A scientist with an interest in genetics impregnates a sex worker with the seed of a hanged murderer. The sex worker gives birth to a child who has no concept of love, whom the scientist adopts.

title: Horrid Henry the Movie
plot: Horrid Henry finds himself doing things he never ever thought he'd do, and then some.

title: Compulsion
plot: After a fight with her boyfriend, a successful female erotic novelist on a book tour of Europe joins her ex and his female friend, with whom she falls madly in love, for a party at a castle owned by a dangerous cult.

title: The Mambo Kings
plot: Two Cuban brothers bring a new music to the 1950s USA. They are as different as the problems that await them.

title: Blood Work
plot: Still recovering from a heart transplant, retired F.B.I. profiler Terry McCaleb returns to service when his own blood analysis offers clues to the identity of a serial killer.

title: Gettysburg
plot: In 1863, the Northern and Southern forces fight at Gettysburg in the decisive battle of the American Civil War.

title: Pontypool
plot: A radio host interprets the possible outbreak of a deadly virus which infects the small Ontario town he is stationed in.

title: Godzilla vs. Frankenstein
plot: A reporter stumbles upon weather experiments on a tropical island, discovering giant mantises, a castaway woman, and an infant monster that Godzilla must adopt as his own.

title: French Without Tears
plot: The love affairs of three young Englishmen at a language cramming school in the south of France. Diana, the sister of one of the boys, arrives in town to flirt with all of her brothers' schoolmates.

title: The Girl of the Golden West
plot: A bandit disguises himself as an officer in an attempt to woo a saloon singer.

title: The Wings of the Dove
plot: An impoverished woman who has been forced to choose between a privileged life with her wealthy aunt and her journalist lover, befriends an American heiress. When she discovers the heiress is attracted to her own lover and is dying, she sees a chance to have both the privileged life she cannot give up and the lover she cannot live without.

title: Ordeal by Innocence
plot: Christmas 1954. Wealthy philanthropist Rachel Argyll is murdered at her family estate Sunny Point. Her adopted son Jack Argyll is arrested for her murder. He vehemently protests his innocence.

title: The Black Windmill
plot: A British agent's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.

title: The Guns of Navarone
plot: A team of Allied saboteurs is assigned an impossible mission: infiltrate an impregnable Nazi-held Greek island and destroy the two enormous long-range field guns that prevent the rescue of 2,000 trapped British soldiers.

title: The Player
plot: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected, but which one?

title: The Yearling
plot: A boy persuades his parents to allow him to adopt a young deer, but what will happen if the deer misbehaves?

title: The Thing
plot: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

title: The Female
plot: In the distant future, the world is under the control of a master computer. However, small groups of people view ancient sex films, from the 20th Century, in secret for fun.

title: The Bride with White Hair 2
plot: On Kit and Lyre's wedding night, Lien Ni-Chang, the bride with white hair kidnaps Lyre and takes her to her harem of fighting women to indoctrinate her against Kit. Kit tries to lead a rescue party and go up against the formidable enemies.

title: The Phantom Lover
plot: In 1930's China, an opera troupe arrives at an abandoned theater, haunted by the spectral figure of it's previous owner - a once great opera singer - who now seeks to turn the company's young leading men into a great star like himself.

title: Escape from the Planet of the Apes
plot: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

title: My Mother and Her Guest
plot: In 1943, the Coyne family and their neighbours struggle to maintain a normal life after a US Army Air Force base is set up in the middle of their rural parish.

title: Romanzo Criminale
plot: This crime drama, set in Rome in the 1970s, tells the story of the Banda della Magia, a prolific Italian crime family responsible for some of the country's most violent crimes.

title: Village of the Damned
plot: A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.

title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
plot: Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

title: Last Refuge
plot: Philippe and Sylvie have to do with Alvarez, dangerous band leader. They break with him and commit robbery and murder. Sylvie offers Philippe to take refuge in his calm family.

title: The Lincoln Lawyer
plot: Need a lawyer? Call Mickey Haller. He runs his law practice out of his Lincoln, and he's ready to hit the gas. Moving through Los Angeles, he takes cases while balancing a private life that includes being a father and having two ex-wives.

title: Straight Time
plot: The difficulties of a career burglar to reinsert himself after being released on parole.

title: Freedom Writers
plot: Erin Gruwell, a young teacher in a racially divided Los Angeles school, inspires her class of at-risk students, deemed incapable of learning, to learn tolerance, apply themselves, and pursue education beyond high school.

title: Liar Game: Reborn
plot: College graduate Yu Shinomiya is invited to the Liar Game, which has been restarted by funding from new investors. She turns to her psychology professor for help, who is none other than Shinichi Akiyama, former Liar Game champion. He advises her to ignore the invitation, but afraid of the penalty fee should she do so, she decides to participate. Soon, Akiyama is issued an invitation of his own by Fukunaga, who now works for the game. Playing on Akiyama's sympathy for the naive student, Fukunaga manages to get Akiyama to participate as well. The game this time is a diabolical version of Musical Chairs. Once again, Akiyama's cunning and ingenuity is put to the ultimate test.—Anonymous

title: Black Beauty
plot: Two women with contrasting lives become connected. One fights for survival after her mother forces her out while the other runs a prosperous company.

title: Let's Scare Jessica to Death
plot: A recently institutionalized woman has bizarre experiences after moving into a supposedly haunted country farmhouse and fears she may be losing her sanity once again.

title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
plot: In late 1950s New York, a young underachiever named Tom Ripley is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

title: The Jungle Book
plot: After a threat from the tiger Shere Khan forces him to flee the jungle, a man-cub named Mowgli embarks on a journey of self discovery with the help of panther Bagheera and free-spirited bear Baloo.

title: Sorcerer
plot: Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across dangerous Latin American jungle.

title: The Shipping News
plot: An emotionally beaten man with his young daughter moves to his ancestral home in Newfoundland to reclaim his life.

title: The House of Bernarda Alba
plot: Bernarda Alba and her several daughters have just returned from the funeral of Bernarda's husband. Bernarda is a strict and rigid figure, given to no sentimentality nor laxity, and her daughters chafe under their virtual imprisonment in the home.
